net.tridentsdk.server.service

Class TransactionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
      • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingCollection<Transaction>
        • net.tridentsdk.server.service.TransactionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Transaction>, Collection<Transaction>, Registry<Transaction>, Transactions

    public class TransactionHandler
extends com.google.common.collect.ForwardingCollection<Transaction>
implements Transactions
    Performs API transactions
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

        public void deposit(int account,
                    Transaction transaction)
        Description copied from interface: Transactions

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw(int account,
                        Transaction transaction)
        Description copied from interface: Transactions
        Withdraws an item from the account

        IMPORTANT: The sender is the person withdrawing from the account. The receiver is not taken into consideration, so that is allowed to be null.

        Specified by:
        withdraw in interface Transactions
        Parameters:
        account - the account ID to be used
        transaction - the transaction to perform
        Returns:
        false if the account for the withdrawer does not exist, true if the transaction completes successfully

      • amount

        public int amount(int account,
                  Object person,
                  Object type)
        Description copied from interface: Transactions
        Obtains the amount of an item as indicated by the amount field in each transaction
        Specified by:
        amount in interface Transactions
        Parameters:
        account - the account ID to be used
        person - the object which the transactions were sent to that is checked by this amounting
        type - the types to find the amount of. Also the parameter in Transaction.item()
        Returns:
        the amount of an item of type type found the account of person, or Integer.MIN_VALUE if the account for person does not exist, or the accound ID is not used for that person

        protected Collection<Transaction> delegate()
        Overrides:
